name: M.I.N.D.
description:
M.I.N.D. Is a retro-style platformer about, and set in a malfunctioning mind control device.

The game is story-focused, with new and innovative one or two-player gameplay. The game's short length is made up with greatly varied bits of different gameplay, including puzzles, platforming and a space shooter.




M.I.N.D. Is made with Clickteam Fusion by two Finnish 15-year-olds, Kasper and Johannes. We're only trying to cover the developement costs of this projects with the release, so you're supporting us and our future careers by buying this game!

If the project is successful, we plan on adding a challenge mode with individual levels.
